titleStmt.title: Memoirs of the Right Honourable Arthur, Earl of Anglesey, late lord privy seal intermixt with moral, political and historical observations, by way of discourse in a letter : to which is prefixt a letter written by his Lordship during his retirement from court in the year 1683 / published by Sir Peter Pett, Knight ...
titleStmt.author: Anglesey, Arthur Annesley, Earl of, 1614-1686.
Pett, Peter, Sir, 1630-1699.

notesStmt.note: A letter on politics and theology, written by Lord Anglesey to Sir Peter Pett, and published after the earl's death.
Errata and advertisements on p. [1] at end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
